html:
11.12.19  8:02 pm   thoughts on boats??

     i like the floating feature

11.12.19  7:33 pm   Is "Joker" a good movie?

     probably but i don't want to watch it

11.12.19  7:06 pm   Are you actually quitting 

     quitting what

11.12.19  6:22 pm   What's your favorite number that's in pie I like 7

     50288

11.12.19  6:21 pm   So I saw you answer a question and you said the smash brothers character selection screen do you like smash or no cuz it my favorite game

     i haven't played it since about 15 years ago and even then i was playing a version that was probably 6 years older than that, but it was pretty good then. it's probably different now i'm guessing

11.12.19  5:45 pm   if i just pretend i am farther along in life than i actually am will i be a fraud and then die?

     well that's a negative spin on it, but yes

11.12.19  5:25 pm   Do you prefer feeling hot or feeling cold?

     hot

11.12.19  5:23 pm   Hey Bill. How are you?

     pretty good

      I hope you are having a fine, swell day! Speaking of which, can you adopt me?

     i thought i already did, but i will see if i can do it again

11.12.19  5:17 pm   My best friend has abandoned me, what should I do?

     book tour!

11.12.19  4:54 pm   Hey, I understand when I procrastinate because I am avoiding to do something that I don't really want to do, but lately I find myself more often procrastinating instad of doing something that I *actually* really want to do!!! Why does that happen!!!!? I don't understand! D: Like while dumbly surfing on the internet or whatever I am doing to procrastinate I will think "ah! I actually would prefer to be doing X thing" but then I don't stop! What's going on!?!??!?! ):

     the internet is just too strong

11.12.19  3:46 pm   I have a smol tune I want to share with the world, how should I do this?

     post it online. but try to give it some context first. make a video or use it in a story some how

11.12.19  3:31 pm   In your opinion does Australia exist?

     yes

      Personally I think it's nasa 

     yes, that would be the National Australian State of Australia

11.12.19  3:30 pm   Could the universe fit into a matchbox?

     no

11.12.19  1:16 pm   any april fools plans?

     hopefully doing a talk show

11.12.19  1:15 pm   Hey bro are you quitting youtube please be honest

     of course not. youtube is awesome, and my video making capability is still in its infancy

11.12.19  1:14 pm   bill your videos and question answers sound like an AI that is vainly trying to understand the human situation.

     that makes sense

11.12.19  1:01 pm   College is so boring because I already know the stuff. They are teaching for the first year and a half. How do I make it go faster 

     you can't but you can probably get a lot of other stuff done in the mean time

11.12.19  12:57 pm   Hey Bill, I'm having trouble writing memorable good solos for my music. I can write musical solos, but not memorable ones per se. Any advice on how to write one? Thanks.

     it might be better to play it, not write it. start the song fresh from the beginning. and then play it as if you are on stage. you kind of have to make a big scene. like when you are at the tractor store and your mom won't buy you the tractor you want

11.12.19  12:55 pm   what is the weirdest question you got that you didn't post to this page?

     i have never gotten a weird question

11.12.19  12:47 pm   is there a reality about how this website works and what you see?

     i think so, and if not there will be

      if so where, and if not I'm interested,

     probably on the reality page

      thabks.

11.12.19  11:51 am   are you a real real person or just a fake real person like me

     real real, and fake fake

11.12.19  11:42 am   There's a fault with your website, it says you're posting things on the 11th of December today

     that's actually november 12, and the fault is not this website, the fault would have to be with the United States

11.12.19  11:42 am   i am making albums on my hard drive with your songs, sorted approximately by release date. when you release the song recorded in march or whenever, does it thematically fit in the era from 2018-might quit because it was made the same way? or do you anticipate keeping the same music production techniques, making my divisions fairly arbitrary?

     i'm not sure. that one is kind of a unique case. it would probably go at the end of the album starting with 'best friends with my own front door'

11.12.19  11:40 am   so how's the learning to make videos going

     meh, pretty good

11.12.19  11:38 am   what is the difference between geometry and mechanics?

     geometry is just the idea of the shapes. mechanics is what happens when the shapes become real

11.12.19  11:24 am   If I am not wrong, being wrong is being right.
I made this sentence up and was too lazy to figure out if it has any meaning, help?

     i think there are some faint whisps of meaning in there somewhere

11.12.19  11:11 am   What is the best type of bagel, what is your favorite type of bagel,

     everything

      and what is a bay gull?

     nothing

11.12.19  9:11 am   what would happen if a whale ate a nuclear bomb

     it might still be hungry

11.12.19  9:07 am   I was having trouble coming up with a senior quote, but then I suddenly realized that "I'm just trying to be reasonable" is a great quote to use. However, since I am quoting you, I feel like I should probably write it as "i'm just trying to be reasonable", since that's how you always write it. However, I have a feeling that people are not going to understand and think that I have just mistakenly forgotten to capitalize it. So, what do you think I should do?

     you could try all caps. that quote in all caps seems pretty solid to me. probably better than the lower case version. i've been saying it for years, and i think it's some kind of inside joke with myself and honestly i don't even get it

11.12.19  8:01 am   I've seen reference here on the Questions page to you preferring not to listen to your own music for "superstitious" reasons. Could you elaborate for someone who may have missed a previous explanation?
 

     normally if you listen to music, if you hear anything's wrong you can be like "oh well, at least it wasn't me" .... but if i hear my own thing, and anything seems wrong, terribly wrong, desperately wrong, all all wrong, or any combination of those, it's my fault and also i can't change it and everyone has already heard it

11.12.19  7:45 am   Hello bill could you explain to me the Mathematics

     yes. the first thing you'll want to do is get some balls. then count the balls. stay tuned for the next step(s)

11.12.19  7:35 am   I've been listening to a lot of your  music and  I  enjoy listening to your bass notes any tips on learning bass?

     start by doing the simplest thing possible. pretend there is a rule that you can only play 1 note per chord. try to resist doing anything else for as long as possible. then soon you will explode into complications and it will be just right

11.12.19  7:26 am   How fake do you have to be to become real?

     double fake. you must fake being fake

11.12.19  7:17 am   How do you feel about them changing the abc song?

     publicity stunt

11.12.19  6:35 am   does u love me

     yes. wait who is this

11.12.19  6:05 am   did you do the thing

     i have done it before, but i am doing it again

11.12.19  5:24 am   Why do you write in all lowercase letters?

     i don't, but i use mostly lowercase letters. this is just a technique i must have learned from years of living in society

11.12.19  3:40 am   how does one make accounting fun?

     hire someone else to do it

11.12.19  2:50 am   What do you think about the industrial revolution ?

     seems like it's time for another one

11.12.19  2:38 am   are you making a video right now?

     i am learning to make videos. the more i say that the more lame it sounds, but honestly if i didn't do that before then i wouldn't have been able to make the videos i have made

11.12.19  2:10 am   will velcro ever be mentioned in another episonde?

     i was thinking maybe the velcro could mention stuff

11.12.19  1:37 am   Whats your favourite sandwich?

     that would be a compromise sandwich. what one person wants is on 1 side, what the other person wants is on the other side, and what actually happens is in the middle

11.12.19  1:05 am   Why does your content make me happy?

     that is to prevent you from making angry calls to the customer support line

11.12.19  12:51 am   Do you often sing to yourself while you work?

     sometimes

      If so what kind of music specifically?

     it would be whatever music i am making

11.12.19  12:30 am   What is the max number of bags of popcorn 

     i suppose it depends on your screen resolution

11.12.19  12:21 am   If only a person could harness the power of your mind, we would have peace and chaos at the same time.

     peace and chaos at the same time is the normal state of the world

11.12.19  12:15 am   whats the most embarrassing moment you've experienced that you are willing to share 

     shuffled a deck of cards but then it ended up in the exact same order

11.12.19  12:13 am   How do I spell "necessity"?

     i have no idea

11.12.19  12:11 am   what english spelling of an animal sound do you think is the least accurate

     bark

11.12.19  12:02 am   what are your snow feelings

     cold and wet?
